page.title: 07The Barton Gala
page.content: The Barton Gala is an annual Spring event which is organised by The Holland Sports club and held on their ground. Many local organisations are invited to ake part and this year Brownies,Guides ,Cubs,Scouts,Playgroups and Charitable organisations etc.ran stalls.The Gala begins with a parade around the village of attractively decorated floats. When the floats arrive at the ground the event is officially opened, usually by a celebrity.Some of the afternoon's attractions are hot dog stalls,rides for children,raffles, rifle shooting, smashing crockery,inflatable Fun Castle ,Barton Wind Band, a dog show,Veteran Motorcycle show, cake stall,Bucking Bronco,White Elephant stall,Police Force and Fire Brigade vehicles and refreshments. The final event is a dance which is held in the a large marquee during the evening.
